}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===FCC info=== The FCC docs specify that this FCC ID is also used for the [[TRENDnet TEW-800MB|TEW-800MB]] :(''AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''). The TEW-800MB is also specified as an additional model in the FCC filing :for the [[TRENDnet TEW-811DRU|TEW-811DRU]] as the ''AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''.
Per the FCC photos... *"WRT-C80B" and "Rev. UB" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. *BCM4360 is the 5GHz Wi-Fi IC. :It is using three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1504 SE5003L1 / 5003L1 power amplfiier ICs] *The Mini PCIe wireless module (2.4GHz radio) is using BCM4331 :(and would appear to be dual-band capable). *It is using three SE2594L Dual Band 802.11a/b/g/n Wireless LAN FEMs.
The default SSID pattern for the 2.4GHz band may be '''TRENDnet812XXXX''' :(where '''XXXX''' appears to be a random 4-digit number).
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32139-trendnet-tew-812dru-ac1750-dual-band-wireless-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"0500-2531801000" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the main board. :A sticker with "081R-WRTC80BN00 R05" (probably) and some other :stuff is affixed to the LAN port casing, D8:EB:97 OUI. :Default SSID formats of '''TRENDnet812XXXX''' and '''TRENDnet812acXXXX''' :('''XXXX''' being a 4 digit number pre-set per router)
